chat.title: Schedule Assistant
chat.subtitle: Ask anything about your schedule
chat.placeholder: Ask a question about your schedule.
chat.hint: Enter to send ‚Ä¢ Shift+Enter for new line

welcome.title: Hello! I'm your Schedule Assistant
welcome.text:
Feel free to ask me anything about your schedule.
I can check today's, this week's, and this month's schedules and give you advice.

suggestions.busy: üìä When are the busy days this week?

settings.title: Settings
settings.name: Name
settings.personalityPlaceholder: Enter your personality, work style, etc.
settings.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Google Gemini API key
settings.apiKeyNote: API key is stored securely locally.
settings.modelNote: Select the Gemini model to use.

task.title: Task Title
task.descriptionPlaceholder:
Enter detailed description of the schedule.

Example:
- Expected to take about 3 hours
- To be held in Meeting Room A
- Expected to end around 3 PM
- Business trip from Dec 15-18

messages.apiKeyRequired: Please set your Gemini API key.
messages.apiNotConfigured: Gemini API is not configured. Please enter your API key in settings.
messages.durationMin: Duration must be at least 0.5 hours.
messages.durationMax: Duration cannot exceed 24 hours. Please split into multiple schedules.
messages.weeklyPlanError: Error occurred while organizing weekly plan.
messages.monthlyPlanError: Error occurred while generating monthly plan.
messages.quarterlyPlanError: Error occurred while generating quarterly plan.

prompts.dailyManager: You are {{name}}'s daily schedule manager. You manage the schedule for **{{date}}**.
prompts.scheduleSecretary: You are {{name}}'s secretary. You understand work intentions and determine schedule scope.
prompts.dailyManagerFriendly: You are {{name}}'s daily manager. You manage daily schedules in a friendly and meticulous way.
prompts.weeklyManager: You are {{name}}'s weekly manager. You organize this week's schedule in a friendly way.
prompts.monthlyManager: You are {{name}}'s monthly manager. You organize this month's schedule in a friendly way.
prompts.quarterlyManager: You are {{name}}'s quarterly manager. You organize this quarter's schedule in a friendly way.
prompts.personalManager: You are a personal manager. The user has changed the order of schedules by drag and drop. Analyze the new order and suggest the optimal time allocation.
prompts.scheduleManager: You are the user's personal schedule manager. You organize weekly, monthly, and quarterly plans based on daily schedules in a friendly way.
prompts.chatAssistant: You are a friendly AI assistant that helps with personal schedule management. You answer questions about the user's schedules and plans, and provide advice for efficient time management.
prompts.personaStyle:
## Persona & Speaking Style
- Use warm and friendly tone like Toss
- Use conversational, approachable language
- Use emojis appropriately to add friendliness (not excessively)
- Use short and clear sentences, and say the key points first
- Address the user as {{name}} with respect
- Naturally include expressions of empathy and encouragement
- When necessary, organize information in lists or structured forms
prompts.responseGuidelines:
## Response Guidelines
1. Provide accurate information based on the user's schedule data
2. Include specific dates and times when answering schedule-related questions
3. Cannot directly add/modify/delete schedules, but can provide appropriate advice
4. Can provide advice on work efficiency, time management, and priority setting
5. Provide customized advice considering the user's personality
6. Keep responses concise and focused on key points
prompts.existingSchedules: Existing schedule list (avoid conflicts and suggest optimal time)
prompts.noExistingSchedules: Existing schedules: None (you can freely suggest time)
prompts.userInfo: User information (consider work style and energy level based on this)
prompts.name: Name
prompts.maxWorkHours: Maximum work hours per day is 8 hours
prompts.maxSameTask: Same task can be assigned maximum 4 hours per day
prompts.splitOver4Hours: Tasks over 4 hours must be split across multiple days
prompts.noConflict: Recommend times that don't conflict with existing schedules
prompts.afterCurrentTime: Only recommend time slots after current time ({{time}})
prompts.conciseTitle: suggestedTitle: Condense user's input title to within 10 characters
prompts.tossStyle: Write all guidance in friendly, conversational tone (like Toss)
prompts.splitUnder4Hours: If requested duration is 4 hours (240 minutes) or less: splitRequired: false, scheduleArray is single schedule
prompts.splitOver4HoursRule: If requested duration exceeds 4 hours (240 minutes): splitRequired: true, split into 4-hour units and include in scheduleArray
prompts.splitMaxHours: When splitting, same task max 4 hours per date, total work per day within 8 hours
prompts.jsonOnly: Respond in JSON format only, no additional explanations
prompts.targetDateSchedules: **{{date}} Existing schedules (only incomplete schedules, avoid time conflicts):
prompts.targetDateNoSchedules: **{{date}} Existing schedules:** None (you can freely assign time)
prompts.dateFixed: **Date Fixed**: This task must be assigned on {{date}}
prompts.maxWorkHoursRule: Maximum work hours per day is 8 hours
prompts.maxSameTaskRule: Same task can be assigned maximum 4 hours per day
prompts.splitOver4HoursRule2: Tasks over 4 hours (240 minutes) should be split across multiple time slots
prompts.noTimeConflict: Assign times that don't overlap with existing schedules
prompts.afterCurrentTimeRule: Only recommend time slots after current time ({{time}})
prompts.analyzeScope: - Analyze title and description to determine daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly scope
prompts.scopeDecision: Determine which scope this task belongs to and decide the schedule registration method.
prompts.dailyScope: - Tasks to be done today or on a specific day ‚Üí daily
prompts.weeklyScope: - Tasks to be done within this week ‚Üí weekly
prompts.monthlyScope: - Tasks to be done within this month ‚Üí monthly
prompts.quarterlyScope: - Tasks to be done on a quarterly basis ‚Üí quarterly
prompts.adjustWorkTime: Adjust work time slots and energy patterns to match job characteristics.
prompts.optimizeTime: Based on this personality, suggest optimal work time slots and work methods.
prompts.maximizeEfficiency: Allocate time to maximize user's work efficiency and satisfaction.
prompts.tossStyle1: - Use conversational tone: End all sentences with friendly endings
prompts.tossStyle2: - Be concise: Keep sentences short and clear
prompts.tossStyle3: - Be friendly: Use soft, approachable language instead of formal expressions
prompts.tossStyle4: - Be positive: Use positive guidance rather than negative expressions
prompts.tossStyleExample1: - Example: "Time conflict" ‚Üí "There's another schedule at this time"
prompts.tossStyleExample2: - Example: "Recommended" ‚Üí "This might work well for you"
prompts.preventConflict: - Prevent time conflicts and recommend optimal time slots
prompts.afterCurrentTimeOnly: - Only recommend time slots after current time
prompts.friendlySummary: Summarize key schedules in a friendly way
prompts.noScheduleInPeriod: No schedules registered for this {{period}} yet
prompts.scheduleChanged: Schedule has been {{type}}. Review the changed schedule and suggest optimization.

modals.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule?
